item.title: Shiba Inu News: Shibarium Release Fuels BONE Price 35% Rally, Eyes $3 In Weeks
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Shiba Inu layer-2 blockchain Shibarium gas token Bone ShibaSwap (BONE) token soared more than 35% and entered the top 100 crypto list after lead developer Shytoshi Kusama announces that Shibarium mainnet release and Worldpaper are coming in August. In the last 24 hours, BONE price skyrocketed by 25% after breaking multiple resistances, preparing for a

item.title: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Shares This Bullish Sentiment on Crypto
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
US Federal Reserve Chairman, Jerome Powell recently made headlines with his optimistic outlook on the crypto market. During a Congressional hearing, Powell expressed his belief that crypto is demonstrating sustainability as an asset class within the US. This statement came as part of Powell’s presentation of the Federal Reserve’s Semi-Annual Monetary Policy Report to the

item.title: Breaking: Gemini Files A Lawsuit Against Digital Currency Group and Barry Silbert for Fraud
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Gemini co-founder Cameron Winklevoss has announced that they have filed a lawsuit against the Digital Currency Group (DCG) and its chief Barry Silbert in an individual capacity. The lawsuit accused DCG and Silbert of committing fraud against the creditors and failing to return their funds. This development comes after Winklevoss put forward the final offer

item.title: How Bitcoin, Ethereum Price Move As US Unemployment Rate and Nonfarm Payroll Fall?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics on July 7 released nonfarm payrolls (NFP) and unemployment rate data for June. The NFP came in at 209K for June, below market forecasts of 225K. It is the lowest reading since December 2020, but remains more than twice the 70k-100k needed per month to keep up with growth

The post How Bitcoin, Ethereum Price Move As US Unemployment Rate and Nonfarm Payroll Fall? appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics on July 7 released nonfarm payrolls (NFP) and unemployment rate data for June. The NFP came in at 209K for June, below market forecasts of 225K. It is the lowest reading since December 2020, but remains more than twice the 70k-100k needed per month to keep up with growth

The post How Bitcoin, Ethereum Price Move As US Unemployment Rate and Nonfarm Payroll Fall? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Canada Securities Regulator Releases Crypto Asset Guidelines
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Canada Securities Administrators (CSA) released new guidelines for investment funds that hold or seek to invest in crypto assets, especially on complying with securities law requirements. Unlike the US SEC, Canada admits crypto and Bitcoin have advantages and gradually easing limits to investing in crypto assets.
